ingredients.ingredient: 1 beef sirloin steak, at room temperature
3 tablespoons high-heat cooking oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Pat steak dry with paper towels before seasoning to ensure proper browning
Preheat skillet until smoking hot for optimal crust development
Flip frequently (every 30 seconds) instead of once to achieve even doneness throughout
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you achieve a perfectly caramelized crust while maintaining a tender, juicy interior?
